events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund.
The request has been categorized under the Refund cluster based on the customer's mention of a refund request.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us about your jacket. I'll be happy to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is completely new and I have not worn it at all since receiving it.
Thank you for the information. You are eligible for a full refund. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label that we will email to you shortly.
That sounds great! Thank you for the quick help. I will wait for the return label email to send it back.
The return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed immediately.
Just following up to confirm we have received the returned jacket. Your refund will be completed within 3-5 business days.
The refund has been processed and credited back to your original payment method. We are closing this case now. Thank you!
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
